LanguageData.MousekinRace_Settings_SectionRace_Earles: Mousekins who lose both their ears and do not receive prosthetic or natural implants will commit suicide after 15 in-game days due to social stigma.\n\nDisabling this will keep them alive, but they will continue to experience mood debuffs from missing ears.
LanguageData.MousekinRace_Settings_SectionAllegianceS: Specify how often a random caravan trader from the chosen allegiance faction should visit your settlements.
